title: Saw this Omni used for transporting little kids from school in Delhi.
selftext: Wonder how can they prevent kids to not touch the exhaust even by mistake!!
comments: Omni vans were the protagonists in my kidnapping nightmares as a child. With this they have upgraded to my Final Destination nightmares.
I'd happily rather get kidnapped and not worry about my rent, emi, bills and pending tasks.
A great upgrade, getting baked in a school bus isn't something I've missed from my school days.

Funny story. One of my friends had an Omni. One day I was coming from tuition when he and a few friends stopped it in front of me and pulled me inside. Apharan had just released so it was fun to pose. 

But one of my colony uncle saw this and told my parents that someone kidnapped me. 

I returned home a few hours later only to see a crowd of people standing outside with two policemen taking notes. ðŸ˜‚

I can't explain the hysterical reaction everyone had when they saw me. The policemen scolded my friends and I and told us not to hang around in Omno ðŸ˜‚
Aese friends to mei bhi deserve karta hu
Exactly my thoughts, if this is for school kids. It's disaster waiting to happen.. not just fingers, even long hairs can get sucked...
Itâ€™s much safer than the auto which transports about 9-10 people
That's an accurate tag/ flair if there ever was oneðŸ˜­
